transArray.content: The service attitude at the front desk of the hotel is very good, it is close to the subway, there is a parking lot, and the breakfast is delicious.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. The travel route can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is equipped with complete facilities, electric curtains, refrigerated small refrigerator, and snacks and fresh oranges are provided at the front desk. I hope it can bring you good memories. Thank you very much. Your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only by living well and eating well can you feel like home. I believe that with your support, we will continue to improve the quality of all aspects of the hotel to ensure that you will be happy every time you stay. We sincerely look forward to your next visit! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
